name: openai-monorepo
description: Fullstack monorepo with OpenAI chat API and React client

scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,client,admin -c blue,green,yellow "pnpm --filter api dev" "pnpm --filter client dev" "pnpm --filter admin dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter api build && pnpm --filter client build && pnpm --filter admin build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter api lint && pnpm --filter client lint && pnpm --filter admin lint
